alternate_methods: You can pick up passport application forms from your [local Post Office.](http://www.postoffice.co.uk/branch-finder "Find a Post Office"){:rel="external"}
introduction:
You can complete an online application form to apply for, renew or update a passport.

The pre-printed application form will then be returned to you to sign, date, add any documents or photographs that are needed, and return for processing.
more_information: You can't use this service if you are travelling within the next 2 weeks - you'll need to use the [1-week or 1-day service](passport-quick "Get a passport quickly").
overview: You can apply for, update or renew a passport online
title: Apply, renew or update a UK passport
